title: [BUG] Tizen gcc toolchain conflict/ambiguity ( llvm and C++17 )
body:
for the files to compile, the `Native app. development (CLI)` from `Advance` from `Mobile 4.0` and `Wearable 4.0` must be installed

but that depends on `Gcc 6.2 toolchain` which ships with `LLVM 4.0.0` (`Clang 4`)

`LLVM 10` (`Clang 10`) ships with `Gcc 9.2 toolchain`

in which

```
C++17 implementation status

Clang 5 and later implement all the features of the ISO C++ 2017 standard.

You can use Clang in C++17 mode with the -std=c++17 option (use -std=c++1z in Clang 4 and earlier).
```

however skia sharp builds it as

  Building file: /c/Users/small/source/repos/AndroidUI-SkiaSharp/externals/skia/src/xamarin/sk_xamarin.cpp
  Output Path ./Release
  Invoking: C++ Compiler
"C:\Users\small\tizen-studio\tools\smart-build-interface/../llvm-4.0.0/bin/clang++.exe" -c "/c/Users/small/source/repos/AndroidUI-SkiaSharp/externals/skia/src/xamarin/sk_xamarin.cpp" -o "Release//c/Users/small/source/repos/AndroidUI-SkiaSharp/externals/skia/src/xamarin/sk_xamarin.o" -DTIZEN_DEPRECATION -DDEPRECATION_WARNING  -DNDEBUG -DGR_OP_ALLOCATE_USE_NEW -DSK_BUILD_FOR_TIZEN -DSK_CODEC_DECODES_JPEG -DSK_CODEC_DECODES_PNG -DSK_CODEC_DECODES_RAW -DSK_CODEC_DECODES_WEBP -DSK_ENCODE_JPEG -DSK_ENCODE_PNG -DSK_ENCODE_WEBP -DSK_GAMMA_APPLY_TO_A8 -DSK_GL -DSK_NO_MAKE_SHARED_PTR -DSK_R32_SHIFT=16 -DSK_SUPPORT_PDF -DSK_USE_LIBGIFCODEC -DSK_XML -DSKIA_C_DLL -DSKIA_IMPLEMENTATION=1 -DXML_DEV_URANDOM  -I/c/Users/small/source/repos/AndroidUI-SkiaSharp/externals/skia  -I"pch" -O3 -Wall -c -fmessage-length=0 -std=c++14 -target arm-tizen-linux-gnueabi -gcc-toolchain "C:\Users\small\tizen-studio\tools\smart-build-interface/../arm-linux-gnueabi-gcc-6.2/" -ccc-gcc-name arm-linux-gnueabi-g++ -march=armv7-a -mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=vfpv3-d16 -mtune=cortex-a8 -Wno-gnu  -fPIC --sysroot="C:/Users/small/tizen-studio/tools/smart-build-interface/../../platforms/tizen-4.0/mobile/rootstraps/mobile-4.0-device.core" -Werror-implicit-function-declaration  -fPIC -g -fno-exceptions -fstrict-aliasing -Wall -Wextra -Winit-self -Wpointer-arith -Wsign-compare -Wno-unused-parameter -Werror -Os -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fno-rtti -std=c++17 -fno-threadsafe-statics -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Wp,@./Release/objs/platform_incs_file.inc

error: invalid value 'c++17' in '-std=c++17'
